message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000.
While I appreciate your offer, I'm hoping to get the product for a bit closer to my budget. Would you be willing to consider $1,000,000?

I understand you're looking to get the product for closer to your budget, but I have to consider my own investment. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $1,150,000.
